channel.title: MBallSectionsDR
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trump Is Right. Senate Republicans Should End The Filibuster Before It’s Too Late
item.description: The filibuster will end sooner or later, so conservatives should act now while they have power in the House, Senate, and White House.

item.title: Court Ruling Strikes a Blow Against Civil Rights Enforcement
item.description: A misapplication of the First Amendment has led to an injustice.

item.title: Trump’s Overdue Tariff Rollback
item.description: It would behoove the administration to apply the logic of the latest relief more broadly.

item.title: Trump stands by Tucker Carlson after podcast with antisemite Nick Fuentes
item.description: President Trump defended Tucker Carlson late Sunday after the political commentator split conservatives by having a taped chat with antisemitic podcas...

item.title: Women Need Good Men
item.description: Love is the antidote to our poisonous culture of abortion.

item.title: If Trump Has The Power To Ban Trade, Then He Has The Power To Moderate It Through Tariffs
item.description: Legal precedent, diplomatic equilibrium, and economic logic point in this same direction — the president can impose tariffs under IEEPA.

item.title: Foreign enrollment at U.S. colleges holds steady, for now, despite Trump's visa crackdown
item.description: Foreign students enrolled at U.S. colleges in strong numbers this fall despite fears that a Trump administration crackdown would trigger a nosedive, y...

item.title: In Defense Of The Penny (Because Nobody Would Pay A Nickel For These Thoughts)
item.description: The penny’s detractors nickel and dime us to death with their arguments for efficiency over and against tradition.

item.title: What 60 Minutes Got Wrong About Harvard and the Biomedical Research Enterprise
item.description: A recent segment was a sad attempt to cloak the shortcomings of academic science in hype, sentimentality, and public relations theater.

item.title: A Ruthless Chinese Communist Party Requires A Ruthless Leader

item.title: In reversal, Trump says House Republicans should vote to release Epstein files
item.description: President Donald Trump said House Republicans should vote to release the files in the Jeffrey Epstein case, a startling reversal after previously figh...

item.title: Tennessee Teacher Who Mocked Charlie Kirk’s Assassination Got Her Job Back
item.description: Emily Orbison was reinstated on Nov. 11. She will receive back pay dating to Sept. 15, according to a district reinstatement letter.

item.title: Border Patrol commander touts dozens of North Carolina arrests leaving residents 'overwhelmed'

item.title: The Democrats’ Epstein Dud
item.description: President Trump’s relationship with Jeffrey Epstein was embarrassing, but the latest releases contain no smoking gun.

item.title: Trump seeks primary challenges against Indiana state lawmakers who defy redistricting demands
item.description: President Trump is calling for primary challenges against Indiana GOP lawmakers who failed to redraw the state's congressional maps as he had demanded...
